text: You know what I like about people? They stack so well.
The only time a man can be brave is when he’s afraid.
Mozart, Beethoven and Chopin never died. They simply became music.
Shut up Anderson! You lower the IQ of the whole street.
Mornings are for coffee and contemplation.
When you play the Game of Thrones, you win or you die.
DNA doesn’t make a family. Love does.
Every song ends, but is that any reason not to enjoy the music.
If I die, turn my tweets in to a book.
We can’t cling on to the past, because no matter how tightly you hold on, it’s already gone.
You can spend the rest of your life being afraid of people rejecting you. You have to start by not rejecting yourself. You don’t deserve it.
Mourn the losses because they are many. But celebrate the victories, because they are few.
Never forget what you are, the rest of the world will not. Wear it like armour and it can never be used to hurt you.
If you look for the light you will often find it. But if you look for the dark, it is all you will ever see.
And when you find yourself lost in the darkness and despair, remember it’s only in the black of night you see the stars.
